projects.name: Halli's BookShop - peer-to-peer Ecommerce platform
projects.description: Halli's BookShop is Single page Web Application, peer-to-peer Ecommerce platform with stripe gateway integration, where users can sell and buy books, with multiple features like products search page, shopping cart, and an admin dashboard that help users sell and manage their listings, manage orders, and also track their sales, expenses, and orders statistics.

projects.name: ChatPals - Chat Application
projects.description: ChatPals is a Single page Chat Web Application with real-time ui updates where users can find friends, receive requests, manage their contacts list and chat.

projects.name: Halli's BookShop - Rest-Api
projects.description: Halli's BookShop Api is a restful api built using Node.js. support OAuth 2.0(google Oauth) and JWT authentication, input validation, file upload, Cart management, product(book) CRUD, Stripe payment Gateway.

projects.name: ft_transcendence - Rest-Api
projects.description: ft_transcendence is a restful api with MVC architectural pattern built using Nest.js. support OAuth 2.0(42 authentication) and Two-Factor(OTP) authentication, input validation, file upload, real-time friend requests, direct-messages chat, chat channels creation with role based membership. The server and the database each runs in a dedicated docker container.

projects.name: ChatPals Server - Rest-Api
projects.description: ChatPals Api is a restful api with MVC architectural pattern built using Nodes.js. support OAuth 2.0(google Oauth) and JWT(access and refresh tokens) authentication, input validation, file upload, real-time friend requests and direct-messages chat.

otherProjects.name: ft_services
otherProjects.description: Setting up an infrastructure (kubernetes-cluster) of services that each runs in a dedicated Docker container, configured With LivnessProbe, PersistentVolumeClaim and load balancing.

otherProjects.name: ft_server
otherProjects.description: Setting up an Nginx web server in a Docker container that runs several services, Wordpress, phpMyAdmin and a mariaDB database.

otherProjects.name: ft_containers - data structures
otherProjects.description: Recreated some of the C++ standard library containers with their iterators. the containers are stack, vector and map with AVL binary search tree as inner data structure.

otherProjects.name: Tic Tac Toe
otherProjects.description: Recreated a basic version of the famous Tic Tac Toe game.
